languages.text: "Увы, мы — лишь тень когда-то более многочисленного клана. Большинство нашей родни пало в боях, но мы верим, что последний бой Эрэбис еще не был дан. Мы воспитываем смену, преподаем новобранцам — и собственным детям — премудрости пустотной службы, прежде чем они впервые ступят на борт. Новое поколение... учится служить по-своему".

traits.locale_text: "Старожилы дома продолжают служить династии и Богу-Императору, обучая новобранцев нюансам пустотной службы, прежде чем те впервые ступят на борт. Новое поколение... учится служить по-своему".

languages.text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."
languages.original_text: "Увы, мы — лишь тень когда-то более многочисленного клана. Большинство нашей родни пало в боях, но мы верим, что последний бой Эрэбис еще не был дан. Мы воспитываем смену, преподаем новобранцам — и собственным детям — премудрости пустотной службы, прежде чем они впервые ступят на борт. Новое поколение... учится служить по-своему".

traits.locale_text: "Alas, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more populous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they first set foot onboard. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, notre clan n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il était. Beaucoup des nôtres sont tombés au combat. Cela dit, nous n'avons pas dit notre dernier mot. Nous formons une cohorte de successeurs. Avant même qu'ils ne posent le pied sur un vaisseau, nous enseignons aux nouvelles recrues tout ce que nous pouvons sur la vie dans le vide. La nouvelle génération... apprend à servir à sa manière. »
languages.original_text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, notre clan n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il était. Beaucoup des nôtres sont tombés au combat. Cela dit, nous n'avons pas dit notre dernier mot. Nous formons une cohorte de successeurs. Avant même qu'ils ne posent le pied sur un vaisseau, nous enseignons aux nouvelles recrues tout ce que nous pouvons sur la vie dans le vide. La nouvelle génération... apprend à servir à sa manière. »

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, somos solo una sombra del clan que fuimos, formado por mucha más gente. La mayor parte de la familia murió en combate, pero creemos que los Erebis no hemos librado nuestra última batalla. Criamos cohortes de sucesores. Enseñamos a los nuevos reclutas y a nuestros propios hijos los intríngulis del servicio en el vacío antes de que suban a bordo. La nueva generación... aprende a su manera a servir».
languages.original_text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, somos solo una sombra del clan que fuimos, formado por mucha más gente. La mayor parte de la familia murió en combate, pero creemos que los Erebis no hemos librado nuestra última batalla. Criamos cohortes de sucesores. Enseñamos a los nuevos reclutas y a nuestros propios hijos los intríngulis del servicio en el vacío antes de que suban a bordo. La nueva generación... aprende a su manera a servir».

languages.text: 「悲しいことに、私たちはかつて大勢だった頃の一族の面影はありません。一族のほとんどが戦死したのですが、エレビス家の最後の戦いはまだ終わっていないと信じています。私達は後継者を育てているのです。新たな兵士…そして私共の子供達にも、船に乗り込む前に虚空で仕えるイロハを教えています。新しい世代は…それぞれのやり方で仕える方法を学んでいるのです」
languages.original_text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

traits.locale_text: 「悲しいことに、私たちはかつて大勢だった頃の一族の面影はありません。一族のほとんどが戦死したのですが、エレビス家の最後の戦いはまだ終わっていないと信じています。私達は後継者を育てているのです。新たな兵士…そして私共の子供達にも、船に乗り込む前に虚空で仕えるイロハを教えています。新しい世代は…それぞれのやり方で仕える方法を学んでいるのです」

languages.text: “我们的氏族曾一度人丁繁盛，但遗憾的是，如今的状况大不如前。绝大部分族人都在战斗中牺牲了，但我们相信，伊雷比斯氏族的最后一战还没有打响。我们培养了一批又一批接班人。我们教导招募来的新兵，教导我们自己的孩子，赶在他们踏上军旅生活之前，提前传授他们在军队中服役的技巧。新一代人……正在学习如何以自己的方式服务。”
languages.original_text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

traits.locale_text: “我们的氏族曾一度人丁繁盛，但遗憾的是，如今的状况大不如前。绝大部分族人都在战斗中牺牲了，但我们相信，伊雷比斯氏族的最后一战还没有打响。我们培养了一批又一批接班人。我们教导招募来的新兵，教导我们自己的孩子，赶在他们踏上军旅生活之前，提前传授他们在军队中服役的技巧。新一代人……正在学习如何以自己的方式服务。”

languages.text: "Leider sind wir nur noch ein Schatten eines vormals weitaus größeren Clans. Die meisten von uns fielen im Kampf, aber wir glauben, dass die letzte Schlacht den Erebises noch bevorsteht. Wir ziehen Kohorten von Nachfolgern groß. Wir lehren neuen Rekruten – und unseren eigenen Kindern – alles über den Leerendienst, bevor sie auch nur einen Fuß an Bord setzen. Die neue Generation ... lernt das Dienen auf ihr eigene Weise."
languages.original_text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."

traits.locale_text: "Leider sind wir nur noch ein Schatten eines vormals weitaus größeren Clans. Die meisten von uns fielen im Kampf, aber wir glauben, dass die letzte Schlacht den Erebises noch bevorsteht. Wir ziehen Kohorten von Nachfolgern groß. Wir lehren neuen Rekruten – und unseren eigenen Kindern – alles über den Leerendienst, bevor sie auch nur einen Fuß an Bord setzen. Die neue Generation ... lernt das Dienen auf ihr eigene Weise."

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki bir vakitler çok daha kalabalık olan bir klanın gölgesinden ibaretiz. Soydaşlarımızın pek çoğunu çatışmalarda kaybettik fakat Erebislerin son savaşlarını henüz vermediklerine inanıyoruz. Nice halefler yetiştirdik. Hem aramıza yeni katılanlara hem de öz çocuklarımıza güverteye adım bile atmadan önce uçsuz hizmetinin ayrıntılarını öğrettik. Yeni nesil... Hizmet etmeyi canı istediği gibi öğreniyor."
languages.original_text: "Sadly, we are but a shadow of what was once a much more numerous clan. Most of our kinspeople fell in combat, but we believe the Erebises' last battle is yet to be fought. We raise cohorts of successors. We teach new recruits — and our own children — the ins and outs of void service before they even set foot on board. The new generation... are learning to serve in their own way."
